Charmning setting just south of Silkeborg. Seasonal menus with local ingredients, often with a surprising and unorthodox twist. Extensive wine list with plenty of good stuff to choose from. Outstanding service, very knowledgeable staff. This place deserves a "bib gourmand"...

Fantastic evening, food and wine combined left a huge impression. Everything totally satisfactory. Had around 15-18 small dishes of excellent food accompanied by an equal number of great Austrian wines.

We ordered a five-course gourmet menu and got more than that. We particularly liked the fish (sandart in Danish - pike-pearch). The selection of cheeses exceeded what we have ever experienced: literally more than 100 varieties, most French, but also some of the new Danish "innovation cheeses". The service was professional, yet friendly and with great sense of humour.
The wine-menu was worth every penny. We got five different Austrian wines, perfectly in harmony with the food. 
Conclusion: Probably the best restaurant we have ever visited.
